title: (x) "Om Shanti Om" psychedelic display sans - Oliver {Faiyaz Kolia (self)}
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080103120910im_/http:/typophile.com/files/oso_6034.JPG)

Does anyone know the original font. it looks quite familiar. Ive seen it a few times before.

Thanks

FOUND IT!
